|chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |chip2 = Broadcom;BCM4331; |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/21/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = China

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The Broadcom logo, "BCM94331PCIEDUAL", and "200-120101-0050 A" :is silkscreened on the wireless module in the FCC photos.
Per a C2PC, this device is used (or will be) in the *[[Apple AirPort Extreme Base Station A1408 (MD031LL/A)]] *[[Apple Time Capsule 2TB A1409 (4th Gen) (MD032LL/A)]] :BCM94331PCIEDUAL (SKU): Certification ID: WFA11860
{{WiFiCert|WFA11860|06/13/2011}}
